exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat src, dst, zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n mm_mul2_spec : forall (k : nat) (v w : vec nat n), v#>src = k -> v#>zero = 0 -> w = v[0/src][(2 * k + (v#>dst))/dst] -> (i, mm_mul2) // (i, v) -+> (4 + i, w) v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n Hdst : v#>dst = 0 Hzero : v#>zero = 0 Hst : st = (4 + i, v[0/src][(2 * (v#>src))/dst]) Unable to unify "exists k : nat, 0 < k /\\ (i, mm_mul2) // (i, ?M1458) -[k]-> (4 + i, ?M1459)" with "exists k : nat, 0 < k /\\ (i, mm_mul2) // (i, v) -[k]-> st".

original: intros Hdst Hzero Hst. apply mm_mul2_spec with (k := v#>src). - reflexivity. - auto. - simpl in Hst. inversion Hst. reflexivity.
